radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Ultrasonography of the scrotum and testes
radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal testes, a varicocele on the left side, a cyst (0.6 cm in diameter) on the right side of the epididymal head, and a mixed solid and cystic mass (11.8 cm by 10.8 cm by 9.4 cm) arising from the lower aspect of the right kidney.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: A mixed solid and cystic mass (11 cm in diameter) at the lower pole of the right kidney with thin mural calcification. No evidence of hydronephrosis, venous invasion, enlarged lymph nodes, liver or pancreatic lesions, or adrenal nodules. The mass displaced the inferior vena cava to the left.
An intrapulmonary lymph node, with no evidence of pulmonary nodules or lymphadenopathy.
